fullText: This musical rocks the Nederlander Theater with authentic spirit and rollicking tunes that'll have you tapping your toes and clapping your hands.
dtliExcerpt: This musical rocks the Nederlander Theater with authentic spirit and rollicking tunes that'll have you tapping your toes and clapping your hands.
bwwExcerpt: A few things are missing from 'Million Dollar Quartet,' a jukebox musical that'd fit right in on the Vegas Strip: a buffet dinner, slot machines and, more importantly, a story.
